message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between silver nitrate (AgNO3) and sodium chloride (NaCl)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between silver nitrate (AgNO3) and sodium chloride (NaCl) is:

AgNO3 (aq) + NaCl (aq) â†’ AgCl (s) + NaNO3 (aq)
